data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Kolubarski, Serbia that you have set your Son over all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked.
data.verse: he raised Christ from the dead and seated him at his right hand in the heavenly realms, far above all rule and authority, power and dominion, and every name that is invoked, not only in the present age but also in the one to come.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Kolubarski, Serbia
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 752 believers in Kolubarski, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.section_summary: On average, 12 people will die without a personal relationship with Jesus in the next 100 hours in Kolubarski, Serbia.
data.prayer: Jesus, send your gospel to these.
Father, help the 752 believers in Kolubarski to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 104,048 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Kolubarski, Serbia and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Jew, Serbian-speaking people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, you have chosen the weak things of this world to confound the strong. Make the poor and outcast in the state of Kolubarski a testimony of your strength.
data.verse: God chose the foolish things of the world that he might put to shame those who are wise. God chose the weak things of the world, that he might put to shame the things that are strong;

data.prayer: Father, please send new apostles into the harvest, who can open up new communities for the gospel in the state of Kolubarski, Serbia.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the state of Kolubarski who will make disciples who make disciples.
